title: Understanding Assessment
text: Assessment in mental health nursing involves gathering information to understand a patient's needs and plan appropriate care.

title: Purpose of Assessment
text: The main goal of assessment is to identify problems and develop a plan of care tailored to the patient's needs.

hintAnswer: the collection of available data to inform care planning. Assessment in nursing is important to identify problems and develop a plan of care
title: Defining Assessment
text: What is the primary function of assessment in mental health nursing?
choices: the collection of available data to inform care planning, to identify problems and develop a plan of care
critically examining the meaning of identified cues that inform the nurse on necessary levels of support for the client.
the intersection of formal research findings, nursing competency, and the preferences of the client and family to plan client care
